Changelog
=========

### 0.2.2 (June 2, 2016)

* Fix a default port bug

### 0.2.1 (April 25, 2016)

* Fix the handling of invalid inputs

### 0.2.0 (April 24, 2016)

* Rename the `src` directory to `lib`
* Add new methods:
  * `parseUrl`
  * `delegate`
  * `dispatch`
  * `closest`

### 0.1.1 (August 18, 2013)

* Add a release build script

### 0.1.0 (August 16, 2013)

* First public release
